data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Papáč, Vladimír, Lukić, Marko, Kováč, Ľubomír (2016): Genus Neelus Folsom, 1896 (Hexapoda, Collembola) reveals its diversity in cave habitats: two new species from Croatia. Zootaxa 4088 (1), DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4088.1.2
